DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety tolerability single dose S-1226 ( 8 % ) subject mild atopic asthma .
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Study Evaluate Safety , Efficacy S-1226 ( 8 % ) Subjects With Mild Atopic Asthma
DOC.detailed_description: Phase IIa , placebo-controlled , randomize , double-blind , crossover single dose study evaluate safety , tolerability efficacy S-1226 ( 8 % ) administer nebulization subject mild atopic asthma
